name: Thomas
greetingText: I hope you had a great night's sleep :)
wishText:
Your kind and loving nature towards everyone around you is truly captivating, and it's always a pleasure to be in your presence. Youâ€™ve always been an incredible brother, and I am so happy and grateful to have the opportunity to spend these next 60 days by your side, learning from my big brother. 

We adore you!
text1:
27/06/2024... 
 
 
It is not everyone that we celebrate your birthday
textInChatBox: Happy birthday, many more years of life, etc. etc. etc...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: Because I wanted to do something
outroText: Hope your day is as wonderful as you are
